# sonarr_tag (Resource)

Tag resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "sonarr_tag" "example" {
  label = "some-value"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **label** (String) Tag value

### Read-Only

- **id** (Number) Tag ID

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# import using the API/UI ID
terraform import sonarr_tag.example 10
```
